item.title: Gameboy (DMG) Emulation
item.description: Working on a gameboy emulator currently…

item.title: About me
item.description: Hey, my name is Kevin! I quite like systems programming and computer graphics – my languages of choice are Rust and C++ (sometimes). Currently, I am quite obsessed with emulation development and its exponentially growing complexity. Having only written a simple CHIP-8 emulator so far, the next step is of course a Gameboy emulator (DMG) which is currently in progress! From time to time, I also dabble in computer graphics as that is my main point of study at university – from raytracers in CUDA to simple mesh processing.
item.content:
Hey, my name is Kevin! I quite like systems programming and computer graphics – my languages of choice are Rust and C++ (sometimes). Currently, I am quite obsessed with emulation development and its exponentially growing complexity.

Having only written a simple CHIP-8 emulator so far, the next step is of course a Gameboy emulator (DMG) which is currently in progress! From time to time, I also dabble in computer graphics as that is my main point of study at university – from raytracers in CUDA to simple mesh processing.

Twitter: @xkevio

Github: https://github.com/xkevio

Discord: @xkevio#5633
